amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Homeland Security to conduct a study on the scope and potential impacts of the provisions that require the use of safer processes or chemicals on manufacturers or retailers of pesticide or fertilizer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 111-327 to require DHS to conduct a study on the scope and potential impacts of the provisions that require the use of safer processes or chemicals on manufacturers or retailers of pesticide or fertilizer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
